patternHtml:
Get Ready for 9/15/16

Day of Giving Countdown Clock
b kjb:
// COUNTDOWN WIDGET 2
jQuery(".countdownWidget").circularCountdown({
    startDate:jQuery(".countdownWidget").data("start"),
    endDate:jQuery(".countdownWidget").data("end"),
    timeZone:jQuery(".countdownWidget").data("timezone"),	//Time zone of New York. Find timezone of your location and write here.
    
    //Margin between circles
    margin:15,
    
    //Diameters
    dayDiameter:110,
    hourDiameter:110,
    minuteDiameter:110,
    secondDiameter:110,
    
    //Circle BG width
    dayBgWidth:15,
    hourBgWidth:15,
    minuteBgWidth:15,
    secondBgWidth:15,
    
    //Circle width
    dayCircleWidth:15,
    hourCircleWidth:15,
    minuteCircleWidth:15,
    secondCircleWidth:15,
    
    //Circle BG color
    dayBgColor:"#abacb1",
    hourBgColor:"#abacb1",
    minuteBgColor:"#abacb1",
    secondBgColor:"#abacb1",
    
    //Circle color
    dayCircleColor:"#000000",
    hourCircleColor:"#000000",
    minuteCircleColor:"#000000",
    secondCircleColor:"#000000",
    
    //Text font size
    dayTextFontSize:12,
    hourTextFontSize:12,
    minuteTextFontSize:12,
    secondTextFontSize:12,
    
    //Counter font color
    dayCounterFontColor:"#000000",
    hourCounterFontColor:"#000000",
    minuteCounterFontColor:"#000000",
    secondCounterFontColor:"#000000",
    
    //Text font color
    dayTextFontColor:"#000000",
    hourTextFontColor:"#000000",
    minuteTextFontColor:"#000000",
    secondTextFontColor:"#000000",
    
    //Texts top margin
    dayTextMarginTop:3,
    hourTextMarginTop:3,
    minuteTextMarginTop:3,
    secondTextMarginTop:3
});
